sentence: The committees are provided with sufficient resources to perform their duties and are able to seek, at the Company s expenses, independent professional advice as necessary.
At the same time, we offer college and bachelor s degree upgrade courses for employees in need to enroll in, attracting over 100 employees to seek participation.
Since both the retail and manufacturing industries are labor-intensive and thus have a higher turnover rate, we will continue to monitor the turnover rate and actively seek improvements.
